entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Sarnia
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:07 AM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, -1.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Sarnia Chris Hadfield Airport 09:00 AM EST Saturday 28 January 2023
Condition: Cloudy
Temperature: -1.3°C
Pressure: 102.2 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 65 %
Wind Chill: -3
Dewpoint: -7.1°C
Wind: W 5 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near zero. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this morning. 60 percent chance of snow late this afternoon. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light this morning. Temperature steady near zero. Wind chill minus 12 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of snow mixed with rain. Temperature steady near zero.
entry.summary: Periods of snow mixed with rain. Local snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Temperature steady near zero. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of snow mixed with rain. Temperature steady near zero.
entry.summary: Periods of snow mixed with rain ending in the afternoon then cloudy. Local snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind east 20 km/h becoming north 20 in the morning. Temperature steady near zero. Wind chill minus 7 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 28 January 2023
